targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) AS time,
  toUInt64(data.slot) AS slot,
  toUInt64(data.block_total_cu) AS block_cu
FROM clickhouse_logs.block_metadata
WHERE
  data.timestamp IS NOT NULL
  AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)))
  AND data.block_total_cu IS NOT NULL
  AND data.skipped = false
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  (avg(toUInt64(data.block_total_cu)) / 60000000.0) * 100 AS avg_fullness_pct
FROM clickhouse_logs.block_metadata
WHERE
  data.timestamp IS NOT NULL
  AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)))
  AND data.block_total_cu IS NOT NULL
  AND data.skipped = false
  AND (length('$validator') = 0 OR toString(data.leader) = '$validator')
  AND (length('$slot') = 0 OR toString(data.slot) = '$slot')

SELECT
  avg(toUInt64(data.block_total_cu)) AS avg_cu
FROM clickhouse_logs.block_metadata
WHERE
  data.timestamp IS NOT NULL
  AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)))
  AND data.block_total_cu IS NOT NULL
  AND data.skipped = false
  AND (length('$validator') = 0 OR toString(data.leader) = '$validator')
  AND (length('$slot') = 0 OR toString(data.slot) = '$slot')

SELECT
  max(toUInt64(data.block_total_cu)) AS max_cu
FROM clickhouse_logs.block_metadata
WHERE
  data.timestamp IS NOT NULL
  AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)))
  AND data.block_total_cu IS NOT NULL
  AND data.skipped = false
  AND (length('$validator') = 0 OR toString(data.leader) = '$validator')
  AND (length('$slot') = 0 OR toString(data.slot) = '$slot')

SELECT
  (countIf(toUInt64(data.block_total_cu) >= 54000000) * 100.0) / count(*) AS full_blocks_pct
FROM clickhouse_logs.block_metadata
WHERE
  data.timestamp IS NOT NULL
  AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)))
  AND data.block_total_cu IS NOT NULL
  AND data.skipped = false
  AND (length('$validator') = 0 OR toString(data.leader) = '$validator')
  AND (length('$slot') = 0 OR toString(data.slot) = '$slot')

SELECT
  parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) AS time,
  toUInt64(data.slot) AS slot,
  (toUInt64(data.block_total_cu) / 60000000.0) * 100 AS fullness_pct
FROM clickhouse_logs.block_metadata
WHERE
  data.timestamp IS NOT NULL
  AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)))
  AND data.block_total_cu IS NOT NULL
  AND data.skipped = false
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN pct < 10 THEN '0-10%'
    WHEN pct < 20 THEN '10-20%'
    WHEN pct < 30 THEN '20-30%'
    WHEN pct < 40 THEN '30-40%'
    WHEN pct < 50 THEN '40-50%'
    WHEN pct < 60 THEN '50-60%'
    WHEN pct < 70 THEN '60-70%'
    WHEN pct < 80 THEN '70-80%'
    WHEN pct < 90 THEN '80-90%'
    ELSE '90-100%'
  END AS fullness_bucket,
  count(*) AS block_count
FROM (
  SELECT
    (toUInt64(data.block_total_cu) / 60000000.0) * 100 AS pct
  FROM clickhouse_logs.block_metadata
  WHERE
    data.timestamp IS NOT NULL
    AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) IS NOT NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)))
    AND data.block_total_cu IS NOT NULL
    AND data.skipped = false
    AND (length('$validator') = 0 OR toString(data.leader) = '$validator')
    AND (length('$slot') = 0 OR toString(data.slot) = '$slot')
)
GROUP BY fullness_bucket
ORDER BY fullness_bucket

SELECT
  parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) AS time,
  toUInt64(data.slot) AS slot,
  toUInt64(data.non_vote_transactions) + toUInt64(data.vote_transactions) AS total_txns
FROM clickhouse_logs.block_metadata
WHERE
  data.timestamp IS NOT NULL
  AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)))
  AND data.non_vote_transactions IS NOT NULL
  AND data.vote_transactions IS NOT NULL
  AND data.skipped = false
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Total Transactions Per Block by Slot

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)), INTERVAL 1 MINUTE) AS time,
  avg(toUInt64(data.non_vote_transactions)) AS non_vote_txns,
  avg(toUInt64(data.vote_transactions)) AS vote_txns
FROM clickhouse_logs.block_metadata
WHERE
  data.timestamp IS NOT NULL
  AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)))
  AND data.non_vote_transactions IS NOT NULL
  AND data.vote_transactions IS NOT NULL
  AND data.skipped = false
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  toUInt64(data.slot) AS slot,
  toString(data.leader) AS leader,
  toUInt64(data.block_total_cu) AS total_compute_units,
  (toUInt64(data.block_total_cu) / 60000000.0) * 100 AS fullness_pct,
  toUInt64(data.non_vote_transactions) + toUInt64(data.vote_transactions) AS total_txns,
  toUInt64(data.non_vote_transactions) AS non_vote_txns,
  toUInt64(data.vote_transactions) AS vote_txns,
  toString(data.timestamp) AS timestamp
FROM clickhouse_logs.block_metadata
WHERE
  data.timestamp IS NOT NULL
  AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)) IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(data.timestamp)))
  AND data.block_total_cu IS NOT NULL
  AND data.skipped = false
  AND (length('$validator') = 0 OR toString(data.leader) = '$validator')
  AND (length('$slot') = 0 OR toString(data.slot) = '$slot')
ORDER BY fullness_pct DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(bm.data.timestamp)), INTERVAL 1 MINUTE) AS time,
  COALESCE(toString(vm.data.client_id), 'Unknown') AS client,
  (avg(toUInt64(bm.data.block_total_cu)) / 60000000.0) * 100 AS avg_fullness_pct
FROM clickhouse_logs.block_metadata bm
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT identity, argMax(data, timestamp) as data
  FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_metadata
  GROUP BY identity
) vm ON toString(bm.data.leader) = vm.identity
WHERE
  bm.data.timestamp IS NOT NULL
  AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(bm.data.timestamp)) IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(parseDateTime64BestEffortOrNull(toString(bm.data.timestamp)))
  AND bm.data.block_total_cu IS NOT NULL
  AND bm.data.skipped = false
  AND (length('$validator') = 0 OR toString(bm.data.leader) = '$validator')
  AND (length('$slot') = 0 OR toString(bm.data.slot) = '$slot')
GROUP BY time, client
ORDER BY time, client
